description: This request lists the protected resources corresponding to each backup vault.

parameters.name: BackupVaultName
parameters.description: The list of protected resources by backup vault within the vault(s) you specify by name.

nested_items.name: Results
nested_items.description: These are the results returned for the request ListProtectedResourcesByBackupVault.

nested_items.name: ResourceArn
nested_items.description: An Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that uniquely identifies a resource. The format of the ARN depends on the resource type.

nested_items.name: ResourceType
nested_items.description: The type of Amazon Web Services resource; for example, an Amazon Elastic Block Store (Amazon EBS) volume or an Amazon Relational Database Service (Amazon RDS) database. For Windows Volume Shadow Copy Service (VSS) backups, the only supported resource type is Amazon EC2.

nested_items.name: LastBackupTime
nested_items.description: The date and time a resource was last backed up, in Unix format and Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). The value of LastBackupTime is accurate to milliseconds. For example, the value 1516925490.087 represents Friday, January 26, 2018 12:11:30.087 AM.

nested_items.name: ResourceName
nested_items.description: The non-unique name of the resource that belongs to the specified backup.

nested_items.name: LastBackupVaultArn
nested_items.description: The ARN (Amazon Resource Name) of the backup vault that contains the most recent backup recovery point.

nested_items.name: LastRecoveryPointArn
nested_items.description: The ARN (Amazon Resource Name) of the most recent recovery point.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The next item following a partial list of returned items. For example, if a request is made to return MaxResults number of items, NextToken allows you to return more items in your list starting at the location pointed to by the next token.
